text: Johnny Ray Turner is an American politician. He is a Democratic member of the Kentucky Senate, representing the 29th District since 2000. He served as Minority Caucus Chair from 2003-2014. In April 2007, Turner was sentenced to three months' home detention and one year of probation for "non-willful" vote buying.http://www.votelaw.com/blog/archives/003058.html == References == ==External links== *Kentucky Legislature - Senator Johnny Ray Turner official government site *Project Vote Smart - Senator Johnny Ray Turner (KY) profile *Follow the Money - Johnny Ray Turner **2008 2006 2004 2000 campaign contributions *KentuckyVotes.org - Sen. title: Johnny Ray Turner
